description: ML-powered sales forecasting with multiple models and scenario planning for accurate predictions

test_cases.name: Advanced Forecasting Page Load
test_cases.description: Verify the advanced forecasting page loads correctly with all components
steps: Verify forecasting models section is displayed
Verify model creation form is available
Verify forecasts display section is shown
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads with all components visible and functional

test_cases.name: Forecasting Models Display
test_cases.description: Verify forecasting models are displayed with correct information
steps: Verify each model shows name and description
Verify model type is displayed (revenue, pipeline, customer_growth, churn)
Verify model algorithm is shown (ARIMA, Prophet, Linear_Regression, Exponential_Smoothing)
Verify training data period is displayed
Verify last trained date is shown
test_cases.expected_result: All forecasting models display with complete information

test_cases.name: Model Creation Form
test_cases.description: Test creating a new forecasting model
steps: Verify model creation form is displayed
Fill in model name and description
Select training data period from dropdown
Verify new model is created and appears in the list
test_cases.expected_result: Model creation form works correctly and creates new models

test_cases.name: Model Selection and Forecasts
test_cases.description: Test selecting a model and viewing its forecasts
steps: Verify forecasts section displays forecast data
Verify forecast quality scores are shown
test_cases.expected_result: Model selection works correctly and forecasts are displayed

test_cases.name: Model Retraining
steps: Verify loading state is shown during retraining
Verify last trained date is updated
test_cases.expected_result: Model retraining works correctly and updates forecasts

test_cases.name: Forecast Visualization
test_cases.description: Verify forecast data is visualized correctly
steps: Verify chart is interactive and responsive
test_cases.expected_result: Forecast data is visualized clearly and interactively

test_cases.name: Accuracy Metrics Display
test_cases.description: Verify accuracy metrics are displayed correctly
steps: Verify accuracy metrics section is displayed
Verify MAPE (Mean Absolute Percentage Error) is shown
Verify RMSE (Root Mean Square Error) is displayed
Verify accuracy metrics are properly formatted
Verify metrics are color-coded based on performance
test_cases.expected_result: Accuracy metrics are displayed with proper formatting and color coding

test_cases.name: Trend Analysis
test_cases.description: Verify trend analysis is displayed correctly
steps: Verify trend analysis section is displayed
Verify trend direction is indicated (upward, downward, stable)
Verify anomaly detection results are displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Trend analysis provides clear and actionable insights

test_cases.name: Scenario Planning
steps: Verify scenario planning section is available
test_cases.expected_result: Scenario planning works correctly and provides useful comparisons

test_cases.name: API Data Loading
test_cases.description: Verify forecasting data loads from API correctly
steps: Wait for page to load completely
Verify loading spinner is shown initially
Verify data is displayed after loading
Check browser network tab for API calls to forecasting endpoints
Verify all API endpoints are called: models, forecasts, retrain
Verify data is displayed in the UI
test_cases.expected_result: Data loads successfully from all API endpoints

test_cases.name: Data Formatting
test_cases.description: Verify all data is properly formatted (currency, percentages, dates)
steps: Verify currency values are formatted with $ symbol and commas
Verify percentages are formatted with % symbol
Verify numbers are properly aligned and readable
Verify accuracy scores are displayed as percentages
Verify forecast values are properly formatted
test_cases.expected_result: All data is properly formatted and readable

test_cases.name: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify graceful handling when API fails or data is missing
steps: Simulate API failure (network error or 500 response)
Verify page remains functional after error
Verify retry mechanism works if available
Verify empty state is handled gracefully
test_cases.expected_result: Page handles API failures gracefully with proper error display

test_cases.name: Loading States
test_cases.description: Verify loading states are displayed appropriately
steps: Verify loading spinner is displayed initially
Verify loading spinner is centered and properly styled
Verify loading state disappears when data loads
Verify no flickering or layout shifts during loading
Verify retraining loading states work correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Loading states are displayed appropriately without layout shifts

test_cases.name: Responsive Design
test_cases.description: Verify advanced forecasting page is responsive on different screen sizes
steps: Verify all content is visible and properly laid out
Verify content is accessible and readable
Verify charts and visualizations adapt to smaller screens
test_cases.expected_result: Page is responsive and functional on all screen sizes

test_cases.name: Performance and Loading
test_cases.description: Verify page loads within acceptable time limits
steps: Verify loading spinner is shown during data fetch
Verify no JavaScript errors in console
Verify all images and icons load correctly
Verify smooth interactions when selecting models
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads quickly and smoothly without errors
